data.persona: Flap flap flap. Worm! ANOTHER BIRD! Time to poop.
data.description:
You are in the The town square.
A small park plaza with many trees and flowers, a small gazebo in the middle for larger gatherings. It has lamp posts all throughout as well as being well kept.
There's a Flower, a lamp post, a tree, and a small gazebo here.
The dog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: i want to befriend the dog
data.mid_motivation: i want the dog to trust me
data.long_motivation: i want the dog to keep me safe and make sure that i am protected from snakes and other dangers
